Returns: a new ContentHandler to read an object from a URLStreamHandler.
Parameters: String: the MIME type for which a content handler is desired.
createContentHandler(java.lang.String).Description: Creates a new ContentHandler to read an object from a URLStreamHandler.

ClassDesc: This interface defines a factory for content handlers. An implementation of this interface should map a MIME type into an instance of ContentHandler. This interface is used by the URLStreamHandler class to create a ContentHandler for a MIME type.
